messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, Ty Bevington
<tribarhelmet@...> wrote:
>
> Greetings everyone!
>
> I just wanted to briefly introduce myself. My name is Ty, and I
have had an interest in Japan, particularly the samurai since I was
a child. I have been interested not only in the history, warfare,
social structure, and food.
>
> I will not pretend to be an expert-rather I am hoping to learn
from the group and eventually be able to contribute useful
information and resources. I read your rules and the misconceptions
list and agree to follow them.

Don't lose any sleep over it, we're just one big dysfunctional
family. It's a blast to watch <g>.


> So much for my dreams of being a modern samurai and forcing
cowardly ninjas to commit hari-kiri with a butter knife.
>
> Thanks for reading,
>
> Ty
>
>
>
>

messages.subject: The New Guy
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings everyone! I just wanted to briefly introduce myself.  My name is Ty, and I have had an interest in Japan, particularly the samurai since I was a
messages.messageBody:
Greetings everyone!

I just wanted to briefly introduce myself. My name is Ty, and I have had an interest in Japan, particularly the samurai since I was a child. I have been interested not only in the history, warfare, social structure, and food.

I will not pretend to be an expert-rather I am hoping to learn from the group and eventually be able to contribute useful information and resources. I read your rules and the misconceptions list and agree to follow them.

So much for my dreams of being a modern samurai and forcing cowardly ninjas to commit hari-kiri with a butter knife.

Thanks for reading,

Ty





---------------------------------
Brings words and photos together (easily) with
PhotoMail - it's free and works with Yahoo! Mail.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
